code: import React from'react';import{formatNumber}from'../utils/formatters';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MonetizationItem=_ref=>{let{option,money,followers,onActivate}=_ref;const canActivate=!option.active&&money>=option.costToActivate&&followers>=option.followerRequirement;if(!option.unlocked)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:option.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:option.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Requires: ",formatNumber(option.followerRequirement)," Followers"]}),option.costToActivate>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Activation Cost: $",formatNumber(option.costToActivate)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Income: $",formatNumber(option.moneyPerSecond),"/sec"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onActivate(option.id),disabled:!canActivate||option.active,children:option.active?"Active":canActivate?"Activate":"Requirements Not Met"})]});};export default MonetizationItem;
